content.raw: @{557058:155a32e2-420c-4d50-98e0-0e722f63f906} these are the changes needed for ign-rendering to work with the tip of [ogre 2.1](https://github.com/OGRECave/ogre-next/tree/v2-1) branch. Unfortunately, we are not able to resolve the breaking changes using `#ifdef` because ogre outputs the same version number, i.e. `2-1-0unstable`, for the version we’re using now and the tip version with the breaking changes. So if we decide to roll out new ogre 2.1 debs, we would need to release ign-rendering at the same time. Do you think it’s safe to do this now?
